introDesc: Brace yourselves for the ultimate contest to test your coding skills, because FTMPC 3.0 is about to give you a thrilling challenge and pitting you up against nationwide coders. Check the video out and get set for an amazing ride.
infoDesc: Notre Dame Information Technology Club is a forum for young minds to develop their latent talents in the IT field. Besides harnessing the youths of Notre Dame College, our club is dedicated to preaching the beauty of IT among the growing buds of the country. INIT 3.0 is an endeavour by the club to gather coding enthusiasts all over the country under a single banner in order to experience multiple fascinating worlds of technology including programming, robotics, art, gaming etc.
